title: Neat and Nice
review: for all Mayoites, a value for money hotel with everything in good condition, good service, good rooms and clean bathrooms, just off the highway, accessible to the schools, convenient in all respects.

title: Very Good Resorts for Community Programmes
review: This Resort is Situated on the Road so it is Very Easily Reachable, Very Big Property on Ajmer Jaipur Highway, Value for Money, Good Service, Good Rooms, Nicely Located, Little Maintenance Required.

title: Avoid
review: The hotel is located outside the town, so please don't assume that your sleep will be peaceful.

title: Nice place
review: Nice and newly built resort. Rooms are very spacious and well furnished. Buffet breakfast and dinner having large spread and pure veg.

title: Rating
review: I had a great experience during my stay there. The rooms are very classy with all facilities to fulfill our needs. The management was fabulous  who are very pleasing and very proffesional staff.

title: Nice
review: Paradizzo resort is located in Ajmer city. This resort is good for everyone. Must see location for everyone.

title: Great...
review: One the best resort in Ajmer. We spent great time here. Rooms were clean and well maintained. Service also good and food was also great.

title: Nice resort
review: Paradizzo Resort is nice resort. This is very good resort to spent time with family and friends.good experience.

title: Reunion of school friends @ Paradizzo Resort
review: Let me highlights the points straight away:

title: Nice place
review: It is really nice place for friends and family gathering. Ambiance is good and food is quite hygienic.

title: Don't know why one would go there?
review: Not sure why they call it a resort. This place is situated on the main road and hence very approachable. But there is nothing which will make one to spend a day or have food here. This place is more known as a Wedding Place now. If you are going for food, you will be disappointed.

title: Resort really
review: Its a nice place to be but if you are here with the name Resort to it please don't get attracted. Would give a thump down but a good place to be.

title: Only Ideal place in Ajmer to host a event with quality rooms for stay, and hospitality from the hotel management
review: Recently we hosted a wedding at Paradizzo.

title: Good Holiday destination!
review: Nice Garden, Good Service, Comfortable Stay, Very Clean Resort.

title: Not so clean
review: Toilet is one thing that speaks volumes about a hotel housekeeping service. Paradisso is not Paradisso in this case. Its a typically made Marriage party special hotel with lot of investment.

title: Good Property but needs maintenance.
review: We booked 2 Suites... Reached hotel at 12p.m which is their check-in time but even after calling them before reaching we were made to sit in the waiting area for 15mins with flies buzzing around. What to say of welcome drink.... Even water wasn't offered.
